definition: lit. to put everything out including the tray/to reveal everything/to make a clean breast of it all
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
old variant of 和[he2]/harmonious
surname He/Japanese (food, clothes etc)
old variant of 和[he2]
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess
prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)
to trust/to entrust/to be entrusted with/to act as trustee

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)

sentences.english: 1：First, why don't you lay all your cards on the table ?
sentences.chinese: 首先你为什么不把你的财务情况和盘托出呢？

sentences.english: So Hillary's going to come clean for the votes.
sentences.chinese: 因此，希拉里打算为了选票把真相和盘托出。

sentences.english: But you can't…because it's dark and there are demons.
sentences.chinese: 但又不能和盘托出，因为室内漆黑一片，魑魅四伏。

sentences.english: In order to save her lover, Du comes to court and explains everything.
sentences.chinese: 杜丽娘为了救他，来到官府将详情和盘托出。

definition: lit. count by fives and tens (idiom); to narrate systematically and in full detail
from beginning to end/in its entirety/in accord with fact/literal
actual situation/truth
to illuminate/to open up (a topic)
to tell/to disclose/to reveal
to pour beans out of a bamboo tube/to come clean/to make a clean breast of things
lit. to guard one's mouth like a closed bottle (idiom); tight-lipped/reticent/not breathing a word
to uncover
cause and effects (idiom); entire process of development
honest/forthcoming/to confess
to conceal/to hide (a taboo subject)/to cover up the truth
to tell sb/to inform
the whole story
to expose/to uncover
lips sealed and not saying anything (idiom); fig. to omit mention (of a non-person or embarrassing topic)/to censor
to confess
